request_summary: Launch a new line of spicy coffee beans, including market research, marketing messaging, and legal review.

execution_stages.description: Gather market insights on the potential for spicy coffee beans and craft a compelling marketing message.

sub_tasks: Identify current trends in coffee flavor profiles
Analyze competitor offerings in the spicy coffee segment
Evaluate consumer feedback on spiced coffee products
agents.expected_output: Comprehensive report on market trends and consumer preferences for spicy coffee beans

sub_tasks: Craft a catchy tagline and marketing blurb for spicy coffee beans
Define target demographic for the marketing campaign
agents.expected_output: Marketing blurb and target messaging strategy for the spicy coffee bean launch

execution_stages.description: Legal review of marketing materials to ensure compliance with advertising laws and regulations.

sub_tasks: Review marketing claims for exaggeration or false claims
Check compliance with food advertising standards and regulations
agents.expected_output: Compliance report highlighting any issues and recommendations

optimization_notes: Market research and marketing development run in parallel to quickly produce insights and creative output. Legal review follows to ensure compliance with all claims and advertising standards.
